description:
There is something really fucking hot when these two woman get together. I was off set getting an additional prop when they decided to start "warming up" and Claire started fist fucking Lorelei before anyone was ready. The silent start of the shoot was captured without sound but we have it for you in full after the closing interview for you to add your own soundtrack. Watch as Claire takes total control of Lorelei and makes her do things she has never dreamed of doing before. Deep anal probing, fisting and enemas with nozzles larger than her own asshole...
Even when Claire is being anally assaulted by Lorelei you know who is in control.... Watch as Claire takes what she wants sexually and gives back so much more...
title: Anal Action at it's Deepest & Hardest: Claire Adams & Lorelei Lee
